result.eng: I beg your pardon for my atrocious Irish.
result.ga: Gabhaim pardún agat as mo chuid droch-Ghaeilge
result.orig: Gabhaim pardún agat as mo chuid droch-Ghaeilge
result.html: Gabhaim pardún agat as mo chuid droch-GhaeilgeI beg your pardon for my atrocious Irish.
result.ponchtml: Gaḃaim pardún agat as mo ċuid droċ-ĠaeilgeI beg your pardon for my atrocious Irish.

result.html: Tugadh pardún dóibhThey were given a pardon.
result.ponchtml: Tugaḋ pardún dóiḃThey were given a pardon.
